title: New: Graphics – There’s A Way Back
content:
Graphics’ brand-new cut, There’s A Way Back, is one of those tracks that could very easily be swamped within London’s ever prominent ‘industrial beat world’. This would be a shame, as there’s something inherently artful and focused to be found within his work.

With There’s A Way Back, the track clings to a central set of voice samples. They cling to the track like a shuffling set of disillusioned youths, pining and scratching for some sort of emotive response. Surrounding them, is a beat that almost mocks them in its groove, the voices chasing the beats’ elegant throb.

Stream the track below, and pick up Graphics’ 12-inch out Dec. 12th on GETME!
